{showSignup ? 'Signup' : 'Login'}

{showSignup ? "Already have an account? " : "Don't have an account? "}
{/* Signup form */} {showSignup && (
Signup
{/* Signup form fields */}
Already have an account?{" "}
)}
); }; export default LoginForm;
